channel.title: eLogii News - Delivery and Field Service Management News
channel.description: Recent content on eLogii News - Delivery and Field Service Management News

item.title: Caldic North America Chooses eLogii, the Leading Delivery Management Platform
item.description: Caldic North America has chosen eLogii, the leading next-generation Delivery Management, and Route Optimisation solution to drive efficiency gains and increase visibility across their distribution operations.

item.title: Unimasters chooses eLogii, the leading next generation Delivery Management platform
item.description: Unimasters chooses eLogii, the leading next-generation Delivery Management platform to introduce fully interactive, dynamic planning and route optimisation in the first and last mile
